I could smell the dinner Claire's mom had begun making, it was clear whose bedroom was whose as each door had a plaque on them, the door I just walked through had Claire on it, one room had Mommy on it, another had Lisa and Grace on it, and the last one had Annie and Jennie on it.

I decided to look inside Annie and Jennie's room first. Looking inside, I saw toys littering the floor, some of which were almost as big as me. I walked over to their bunkbed, I climbed the, almost too big, ladder and got onto the bottom bunk, there I saw a brown-haired girl who wore pink pajamas with the name Annie sowed on with purple lettering, she looked pretty cute as she cuddled her teddy bear, I gulped as I imagined myself being cuddled in place of that teddy bear, this might be the first time I've ever been jealous of an inanimate object. Continuing my climb up the ladder, I arrived at the top bunk, I saw a girl who looked exactly the same as Annie, while I couldn't see her name because she had the sheets pulled up over herself, it wasn't that hard to guess that this must be Jennie, the only difference between the twins was the fact that Jennie had bothered to pull the sheets over herself. For some reason, I wanted to check if my assumption, that this was Jennie, was correct. I climbed onto her bed and carefully made my way to the head of it, being sure not to wake the 10-year-old giantess in the process. After I got to her head I took a deep breath and carefully pulled the covers back. I had expected to see pink pajamas with a name sown on them, but I was very much mistaken. I pulled the sheets back revealing more of the giantess, I looked at the giantess's chest, but instead of seeing a name, I saw her little pink nipples bare for the world to see, I immediately put the sheets back and bid the carefree giantess farewell. If I had stayed any longer I would be set on who I wanted to become my new "mommy". Climbing back down the ladder was more of a task than before, not because of how wide the steps were, no, not that, it was because every time I took a step down, my weewee would hit the next step, for some reason my weewee had grown much bigger and my face was burning up. I almost wanted to cry every time I heard a "thwack" as my weewee hit the next step on the ladder. After checking that my, less than sneaky, exit had gone unnoticed, I made my way back out the door, I still needed to check out the big sisters' room. As I exited, in the corner of my eye, I noticed some pink pajamas with the name Jennie sown into them with purple thread.

After leaving the twins' room, I opened the door which said Lisa and Grace on it. I let out a sigh of relief as I saw two single beds parallel to each other. From the conversations I overheard inside the confines of Claire's womb, Lisa was the oldest and Grace was second. The two beds had a nightstand between them which I quickly climbed to get onto their beds, deep down I was very thankful they didn't have bunk beds. I got onto the bed closest to the door, It looks like this must be Lisa's bed as there was a clear size difference, in the chest department, between the two giantesses. Lisa was pretty big, even bigger than anyone in my family, she has long straight brown hair that appears well looked after. I looked over to Grace who had a much smaller chest, she was loudly snoring away without a care for her sister, she was sprawled on top of her bed still wearing all her clothes, her hair was messy but other than that, she was just as good looking as her big sister, I turned back to Lisa, I had never seen someone with such a big chest before, how can someone only 6 years older than me have such a big chest? They look so big that if I got stuck in between them I would be hidden. I took another breath and collected my thoughts, Lisa is huge, if I stayed in her womb I don't even think she'd notice me for a while, Grace, on the other hand, would notice me but maybe I can convince her to let me stay, on the other hand, the twins will definitely notice me, but I'm not too worried about that, they're a lot younger so I can definitely convince them to let me stay, plus they're big enough that it won't be overly obvious that I'm inside one of them. After determining that the twins are probably my safest bet, I made my way out of Lisa and Grace's room and back into Annie and Jennie's. I stared up at the ladder unsure of which twin to choose as my new "mommy"...

15.title: Scratch that, you're living in the Giant do...

info.brief_description: You are adopted by a single giantess mother of 3 giantess children.
info.description:
You were adopted by a giantess family a few months ago and now you feel like you're truly a part of a family. Luckily all your giantess sisters took a liking to you and they treat you as if you were really their brother even though they're all way taller than you. https://sta.sh/21rm0iownn7q

Leo age 10 (you)
You have brown hair and brown eyes. Because it's been a while since you felt at home you can't help but try your best at bonding with your mother and sisters and as such you will probably let them get away with anything.

Jullie age 40 (your mother)
She has black hair and brown eyes. She's always wanted a son but after having 3 daughters she has decided that adoption would be the better choice or more like her only choice now because her husband left her before Lila was born.

Amy age 16 (your older sister)
She has brown hair and brown eyes like her mother. She was the last of your sisters to warm up to you but even though she may act a bit cold at times she actually really loves having a little brother though she never shows you affection when other people are around.

Emily age 7 (your little sister)
She has blonde hair and blue eyes. She immediately accepted you as her brother and constantly tries to show herself off to you but she doesn't entirely understand what it means to have a brother and as such, she keeps getting Amy to help put "her" lipstick on to try and make you like her more.

Lila age 1 (your little baby sister)
She has brown hair and brown eyes like her mother. In the 3 months you've known her you've witnessed her staggering growth. Lila loves playing with you and even though she's so young she appears to understand that she has to be gentle with you.

Side characters added after 142111311 https://sta.sh/21poaxy5frwg
